keyFindings.title: The 2026 Guide to AI Agents
keyFindings.summary: Multiagent systems consist of multiple AI agents working collectively to perform tasks on behalf of users. Agentic frameworks are the building blocks for developing, deploying and managing AI agents.
keyFindings.insights: Multiagent collaboration is becoming mainstream in 2026

keyFindings.title: What's next in AI: 7 trends to watch in 2026
keyFindings.summary: AI agents will get new safeguards as they join the workforce. AI agents will proliferate in 2026 and play a bigger role in daily work.
keyFindings.insights: 2026 is a key year for AI agent proliferation in workplace

keyFindings.title: Top 10 AI Agent Projects to Build in 2026
keyFindings.summary: AI agent projects include creating low-code workflows, using frameworks to develop custom agents, and constructing advanced multi-agent systems.
keyFindings.insights: Low-code AI agent development is a major trend

overallTrends: AI agents joining workforce with safeguards
businessImplications: Enterprise adoption of AI agents accelerating
Need for governance and safety frameworks
Market for AI agent development services
